data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
You always have to be facing forward, so you would not want to be facing backward. So, it isn’t possible to take backward steps. So, the answer is No.

It is 25 years since you began the journey. The starting point is point A - face forward. The one step backward to the starting point is the same as the one backward, or 1 step backward.
